text: Zvirokwazvo, avo vakauya nemanyepo (vachipomera Aishah (RA) mukadzi wamutumwa Muhammad (SAW)) iboka riri pakati penyu. Musafunge kuti zvakakuipirai, asi zvakakunakirai. Munhu wese pakati pavo ane zvaachawana kubva kuchivi. Uye uyo pakati pavo akaita chidimbu chikuru (mumanyepo Abdullah ibn Ubayy), achawana mutongo mukuru (marwadzo makuru)
